title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes join forces to stop Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Fast X
description: Dom Toretto and his family face their most dangerous foe yet, driven by vengeance and family ties.

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief who enters dreams to steal secrets must plant an idea in someone’s subconscious.

title: The Martian
description: An astronaut stranded on Mars uses his ingenuity and spirit to survive until rescue is possible.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker discovers reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion to free humanity.

title: Mufasa: The Lion King
description: The untold story of Mufasa’s rise from orphaned cub to the great king of the Pride Lands.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: Captain America: The First Avenger
description: Steve Rogers becomes the super-soldier Captain America to fight Hydra during World War II.

title: Jungle Cruise
description: A riverboat captain and scientist embark on a perilous journey to find a mystical healing tree.

title: Mission: Impossible
description: Ethan Hunt is framed for betrayal and must uncover the mole in his IMF team to clear his name.
